whoAmI.title: Who am I?
whoAmI.description: Hi, I'm Paul Axel Dionisio â€” a frontend developer who loves creating clean, responsive, and user-friendly web interfaces. I mainly work with JavaScript and React, building fast and modern apps powered by Vite and styled with Tailwind CSS. I enjoy turning ideas into functional, visually appealing digital experiences that feel good to use and easy to maintain.
